SBMLsqueezer 2.0

The Program SBMLsqueezer is a generator for kinetic equations in biochemical networks.

See:
          Description

Packages
org.sbml.squeezer This is the core of SBMLsqueezer as it contains the central classes for reaction type analysis, kineticl law generation and some specialized exceptions.
org.sbml.squeezer.celldesigner This package contains all necessary classes for the interaction between CellDesigner and SBMLsqueezer.
org.sbml.squeezer.gui This package contains all necessary classes for the graphical user interface.
org.sbml.squeezer.gui.locales For localization.
org.sbml.squeezer.gui.wizard This package contains classes of the graphical user interface for the wizard that helps users to generate kinetic equations in one single step for the entire model.
org.sbml.squeezer.io This package contains all necessary classes for parsing and writing files.
org.sbml.squeezer.kinetics This package contains one class for each supported kinetic law.
org.sbml.squeezer.math This package is intended mathematical to contain mathematical functions.
org.sbml.squeezer.resources All resources, such as images, configuration files, or HTML pages, that can be loaded by SBMLsqueezer are located in this package together with the class Resource for loading these files.
org.sbml.squeezer.resources.html The HTML pages in this package are used to display user messages, e.g., about the program, the general help page, the license etc.
org.sbml.squeezer.resources.img All icons and images that are used by the graphical user interface of SBMLsqueezer can be found in this package.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork This package provides classes to extract kinetic equations from the SABIO-RK database.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork.util Important utility functions for the online search of SBMLsqueezer in the SABIO-RK database.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork.wizard This package contains the basic user interface wizard for the search in SABIO-RK.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork.wizard.console A command-line based implementation of the SABIO-RK wizard.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork.wizard.gui The classes in this package are required for the graphical user interface of the SABIO-RK wizard.
org.sbml.squeezer.sabiork.wizard.model The model behind the SABIO-RK wizard can be found in this package.
org.sbml.squeezer.util General utility functions are maintained in this package.

 

The Program SBMLsqueezer is a generator for kinetic equations in biochemical networks. Its internal data structure is based on the Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML) and its Java™ implementation JSBML.

SBMLsqueezer automatically recognizes the type and structure of reactions and discriminates between several different forms of modulation, including inhibition, activation, or catalysis. To this end, SBMLsqueezer interprets model annotations, e.g., Systems Biology Ontology (SBO) terms, or annotations from the program known as CellDesigner.

SBMLsqueezer is a very versatile program that can be used in multiple ways, e.g., as a rate law generating core in third-party applications, as a stand-alone program, as a plug-in for the program CellDesigner, or as a Garuda gadget.

This application programming interface (API) documentation should help you to understand how SBMLsqueezer works and how you can use it in your software.
